author: jfthomps
msg: VCL-776 - rework resource code to have a base class for all resources and inheriting classes for each resource type

blockallocations.php: made a change to getImages when doing the new resource code that returns maxconcurrent as 0 if it is NULL in the database; modified processBlockAllocationInput to not do concurrent check if maxconcurrent is 0

author: rwhitcomb
msg: PIVOT-916:  Make the default uncaught exception handler available as a
separate method in ApplicationContext so that user applications that
implement the Application.UncaughtExceptionHandler interface can have
access to the default implementation if they need it.
This is a merge of revision 1624381 from trunk to branches/2.0.x.
